# AXObject Query

![CI](https://github.com/A11yance/axobject-query/workflows/CI/badge.svg)

Approximate model of the [Chrome AXObject](https://cs.chromium.org/chromium/src/third_party/WebKit/Source/modules/accessibility/AXObject.h).

The project attempts to map the AXObject concepts to the [WAI-ARIA 1.1 Roles Model](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/#roles) so that a complete representation of the semantic HTML layer, as it is exposed assistive technology, can be obtained.

CDN URL: <https://unpkg.com/axobject-query>

## Utilities

### AXObjects

```javascript
import { AXObjects ***REMOVED*** from 'axobject-query';
```

#### Interface

These methods are available on each export from the module. The typing here in the documentation is pseudo-typed. Each export will have its own specific types for each method signature.

```javascript
{|
  entries: () => Array<$Item>,
  get: (key: $Key) => ?$Value,
  has: (key: $Key) => boolean,
  keys: () => Array<$Key>,
  values: () => Array<$Value>,
|***REMOVED***;
```

### Concepts in the project

AXObjects are mapped to their HTML and ARIA concepts in the `relatedConcepts` field.

The `type` field is a loose association of an AXObject to the `window`, `structure` and `widget` abstract roles in ARIA. The `generic` value is given to `DivRole`; it does not exist in ARIA. Divs are special in HTML in the way that they are used as generic containers. Span might have also been associated with a generic type except that there is no `SpanRole` AXObject.

```javascript
[
  [ 'AbbrRole', { relatedConcepts: [ [Object] ], type: 'structure' ***REMOVED*** ],
  [ 'AlertDialogRole', { relatedConcepts: [ [Object] ], type: 'window' ***REMOVED*** ],
  [ 'AlertRole', { relatedConcepts: [ [Object] ], type: 'structure' ***REMOVED*** ],
  [ 'AnnotationRole', { relatedConcepts: [], type: 'structure' ***REMOVED*** ],
  [ 'ApplicationRole', { relatedConcepts: [ [Object] ], type: 'window' ***REMOVED*** ],
  [ 'ArticleRole', { relatedConcepts: [ [Object], [Object] ], type: 'structure' ***REMOVED*** ],
  [ 'AudioRole', { relatedConcepts: [ [Object] ], type: 'widget' ***REMOVED*** ],
  [ 'BannerRole', { relatedConcepts: [ [Object] ], type: 'structure' ***REMOVED*** ],
```

### AXObject to Element

```javascript
import { AXObjectElements ***REMOVED*** from 'axobject-query';
```

AXObjects are mapped to their related HTML concepts, which may require attributes (in the case of inputs) to obtain the correct association.

```javascript
[
  [ 'AbbrRole', [ { name: 'abbr' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'ArticleRole', [ { name: 'article' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'AudioRole', [ { name: 'audio' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'BlockquoteRole', [ { name: 'blockquote' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'ButtonRole', [ { name: 'button' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'CanvasRole', [ { name: 'canvas' ***REMOVED*** ] ],

  [ 'CellRole', [ { name: 'td' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'CheckBoxRole', [ { name: 'input', attributes: [Object] ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'ColorWellRole', [ { name: 'input', attributes: [Object] ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'ColumnHeaderRole', [ { name: 'th' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'DateRole', [ { name: 'input', attributes: [Object] ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'DateTimeRole', [ { name: 'input', attributes: [Object] ***REMOVED*** ] ],

  [ 'HeadingRole', [ { name: 'h1' ***REMOVED***, { name: 'h2' ***REMOVED***, { name: 'h3' ***REMOVED***, { name: 'h4' ***REMOVED***, { name: 'h5' ***REMOVED***, { name: 'h6' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
```

### AXObject to Role

```javascript
import { AXObjectRoles ***REMOVED*** from 'axobject-query';
```

AXObjects are mapped to their related ARIA concepts..

```javascript
[
  [ 'AlertDialogRole', [ { name: 'alertdialog' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'AlertRole', [ { name: 'alert' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
  [ 'ApplicationRole', [ { name: 'application' ***REMOVED*** ] ],
```

### Element to AXObject

```javascript
import { elementAXObjects ***REMOVED*** from 'axobject-query';
```

HTML elements are mapped to their related AXConcepts concepts.

```javascript
[
  [ { name: 'abbr' ***REMOVED***, [ 'AbbrRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'article' ***REMOVED***, [ 'ArticleRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'audio' ***REMOVED***, [ 'AudioRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'blockquote' ***REMOVED***, [ 'BlockquoteRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'button' ***REMOVED***, [ 'ButtonRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'canvas' ***REMOVED***, [ 'CanvasRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'caption' ***REMOVED***, [ 'CaptionRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'td' ***REMOVED***, [ 'CellRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'input', attributes: [ [Object] ] ***REMOVED***, [ 'CheckBoxRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'input', attributes: [ [Object] ] ***REMOVED***, [ 'ColorWellRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'th' ***REMOVED***, [ 'ColumnHeaderRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'input', attributes: [ [Object] ] ***REMOVED***, [ 'DateRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'input', attributes: [ [Object] ] ***REMOVED***, [ 'DateTimeRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'dfn' ***REMOVED***, [ 'DefinitionRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'dd' ***REMOVED***, [ 'DescriptionListDetailRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'dl' ***REMOVED***, [ 'DescriptionListRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'dt' ***REMOVED***, [ 'DescriptionListTermRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'details' ***REMOVED***, [ 'DetailsRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'dialog' ***REMOVED***, [ 'DialogRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'dir' ***REMOVED***, [ 'DirectoryRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'div' ***REMOVED***, [ 'DivRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'embed' ***REMOVED***, [ 'EmbeddedObjectRole' ] ],
  [ { name: 'figcaption' ***REMOVED***, [ 'FigcaptionRole' ] ],
```
